column2: "Na yɛ afɔrmbukyia a wɔhyew do eduhuam: akeesia dua na fa yɛ."
"Ne tsentsen nyɛ anamɔn kor nye fa
column3: na ne tɛtɛr nyɛ anamɔn kor nye fa; ɔnyɛ etwaanan: na no krɔn nyɛ basafa kor: ne mmbɛn mfi sin kor no ara mu."

column2: "Na fa sika mapa dura ho
column4: nye ne nkyɛn nkyɛnmu hyia
column5: nye ne mmbɛn no; na yɛ ho sika hankra fa hyia."

column2: "Na yɛ ho sika nkaba ebien wɔ ne hankra no ase
column4: ne nkyɛnmu ebien no na yɛ no wɔ do; na ɔnyɛ mpoma anan mu na wɔdze aasoa."

column2: "Na fa akeesia dua sinsian mpoma no
"Na fa si ntwamutam a ɔwɔ dase adaka no ho no enyim
column3: wɔ mbɔbɔrhu egua no a ɔwɔ dase no do no enyim
column4: mbrɛ menye wo behyia no."

column2: "Na Aaron nhyew do eduhuam: anapa nyinara
column3: sɛ orisiesie nkandzea no ho a
column4: ɔnhyew."

column2: "Na sɛ Aaron sosɔ nkandzea no ewimbir a
column4: ɔnyɛ daa eduhuam wɔ EWURADZE enyim nkɔ hom mbasantsen nyina mu."

column2: "Mma hom nnhyew do eduhuam fofor bi
column4: anaa edzidzi afɔr; na mma hom nnhue nom afɔr nngu do."

column2: "Na Aaron mpata wɔ ne mmbɛn do afrenhyia mu prɛko: bɔn ho afɔr mpata bɔgyaa no na ɔmfa mpata ne tsir afrenhyia mu prɛko wɔ hom mbasantsen nyina mu: ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn mu krɔnkrɔn ma EWURADZE."
"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Sɛ erohwehwɛ Israelmba hɔn dodow ano ebu
column5: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn mu hɔn a wɔkan hɔn no tse a
column6: ɔno nyimpa biara mma ne kra tsir apondze mma EWURADZE
column7: sɛ erekan hɔn a; ama sɛ erekan hɔn a

column2: "Iyi na wɔmma
column3: obiara a otwa mu kɔ hɔn a wɔkan hɔn no mu no
column4: dwetɛbona fa dɛ krɔnkrɔnbea dwetɛbona: (dwetɛbona yɛ gera eduonu:) dwetɛbona fa nyɛ EWURADZE afɔrbɔdze."

column2: "Obiara a otwa mu kɔ hɔn a wɔkan hɔn no mu no na oedzi mfe eduonu na ekyir no
"Sɛ wɔrema EWURADZE afɔrbɔdze no dze aayɛ hom akra tsir mpatadze a
column4: na ohianyi so mma kakraba

column2: "Na gyegye mpata sika no wɔ Israelmba no hɔ
column3: na fa ma ehyiadzibuw no mu som no; ma ɔaayɛ nkaa ama Israelmba no wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column4: dze aayɛ hɔn akra tsir mpatadze."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Fa boran yɛ eguarsɛn so
column6: ma wɔdze eeguar; na fa si ehyiadzibuw no nye afɔrmbukyia no ntamu

column2: "Na Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no mfa nhohor hɔn nsa ho nye hɔn anan ho wɔ hɔ:"
"sɛ wɔrekɛhɛn ehyiadzibuw no mu a
column4: mma woeennwuwu; anaa sɛ wɔrebɛn afɔrmbukyia no ho abɔsom
column5: ma wɔaahyew afɔrbɔdze a wɔdze gya hyew ma EWURADZE a:"

column2: "dɛm na wɔnhohor hɔn nsa ho nye hɔn anan ho
column3: mma woeennwuwu: na ɔnyɛ ahyɛdze mma hɔn daapem
column4: mekyerɛ ɔno nye n’asefo wɔ hɔn mbasantsen nyina mu."

column2: "Nkyii so EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
"Wo so fa nduhuam mu etsitsir ma woho
column3: eduhuam mɛɛr a ɔsosɔw dwetɛbona ahaenum
column4: nye sinamɔn huanhuam dɛmara ne fa
column10: nye olive ngo kor na fa:"

column2: "na fa yɛ ɔserango krɔnkrɔn
column3: eduhuam a wɔafora no oduhuamforafo nyansa mu: na ɔnyɛ ɔserango krɔnkrɔn."

column2: "Na fa sera ehyiadzibuw no
column5: "na ɔpon no nye no ho ndzɛmba no nyinara
column6: nye kandzeadua no nye no ho ndzɛmba no
column9: "nye ɔhyew afɔr afɔrmbukyia no nye no ho ndzɛmba no nyinara
column10: nye eguarsɛn no nye ne ntaease."

column2: "Na tsew ho ma ɔnyɛ krɔnkrɔn mu krɔnkrɔn: biribiara a ɔka no nyɛ krɔnkrɔn."
"Na sera Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no ngo
column4: ma wondzi m’asɔfoe."

column2: "Na kasa kyerɛ Israelmba no dɛ
column3: Iyi nyɛ ɔserango krɔnkrɔn mma me wɔ hom mbasantsen nyina mu."

column2: "Nyimpa honam do na mma wonnhue nngu
column3: nkyii so mma hom nnyɛ bi a ɔtse dɛm
column4: dɛ mbrɛ no mforafora mu tse: ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn

column2: "Obiara a ɔbɔforafora bi dɛm no
column3: anaa obiara a ɔdze bi bɛka ɔhɔho ho no
column4: wobotwa no efi no nkorɔfo mu akyen."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column4: stakete
column6: nye galbanum; nduhuanhuam a krɔbɔw gyenengyenen ka ho: ne nyina no durdur nyɛ pɛpɛɛpɛr;"

column2: "na fa yɛ eduhuam hyewee
column3: eduhuam a wɔafora no oduhuamforafo nyansaa mu a wɔaposa a ɔyɛ gyenengyenen nye krɔnkrɔn:"

column2: "na siw no fekɔfekɔ
column3: na fa bi gu dase no enyim wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu
column4: mbrɛ menye wo behyia no; ɔnyɛ krɔnkrɔn mu adzekrɔnkrɔn mma hom."

column2: "Na eduhuam hyewee a erebɛyɛ no
column3: mma hom nnsusu no mforaforae do nnyɛ bi mma homankasa homho: ɔnyɛ wo krɔnkrɔn mma EWURADZE."

column2: "Obiara a ɔbɛyɛ bi a ɔtse dɛm
column4: wobotwa no efi no nkorɔfo mu akyen."
